name: GNU Health
description: GNU Health is a free/libre ecosystem for Health practitioners, Hospitals and nationwide Health systems.

SDGs.evidenceText: GNU Health ecosystem contains a Hospital management and information system, a Personal Health Record and a federation server to interconnect user and health institutions
GNU Health has modules to track housing and living conditions of individuals and families. This can be interlinked to an injury surveillance system, GPS-mapped and vizualized with openStreetmap
